thread.section_title: Garden Court Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location.
thread.title_full: Great location. - Review of Garden Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Joey A
title: Great location.
text: Hotel was in a good location. 5 minute walk from the underground station. Walking distances to dozens of restaurants. Staff was very friendly. They serve free tea and coffee in the lobby. We arrived early and our rooms were ready so they held on to our bags for a few hours. Room was very clean, bed was comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.
